get.summary: Returns of alerts for the public.

post.summary: Allows authentication to use API, with a valid key, and return a token if given key is valid

requestBody.description: A mandatory valid key to get a Role for api requests

post.summary: Validates a token given on the authentication process

get.summary: Returns the list of stations for a specific route, given a specific number of parameters received from Google.

parameters.name: lastStation
parameters.description: The headsign ('terminus') of a route (Example: Sta. Apolonia)

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The starting latitude coordinates to match to a bus stop (Example: 38.725311).

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: The starting longitude coordinates to match to a bus stop (Example: -9.151905).

parameters.name: nBusStops
parameters.description: Number of bus stops to return as list result (Example: 4).

get.summary: Returns a list of busstops
Returns a list of busstops  with changes from the sent timestamp
Returns the list of stops that make up the trail of the sent ID
Get a list with the nearest bus stops from any given point. The distance is measured as meters.
Checking if there's a valid connection to the time estimator
Returns a list of estimations with maximum results for the next buses passing in the stop sent by parameter (public stop identifier).

Returns a list of estimations for multiple stops in a single request. 
Stops should be separated by the '-' character. The result returns data from the stops, each containing its list of estimates.
Returns a list of possible points matching the given address
Returns the address to the specified geographical point
Autocomplete for user inputs, so that it can search for an address
Retrieve the address data from a user search
Returns the vehicle positions of the current GTFS realtime feed.
Returns the current GTFS feed.
Returns a valid GTFS feed for a given date.

parameters.name: requestedDate
parameters.description: A date in the YYYY-MM-DD format. Example: 2019-07-02

get.summary: Planning a voyage from one point to another
Returns a list of routes that pass at a given busstop
Returns the list of routes
Returns the list of routes with updates after the sent timestamp
Returns the route by its route number.
Returns the route by its route number within a given period of time.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter variants from a given time

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Filter variants until a given time

get.summary: Returns a list of vehicle statuses.
Returns the list of stop times for a specific busstop, given a route number and its direction, and a date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for the schedule in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format (Example: 2019-12-31)

get.summary: Returns the list of vehicle status for a single route.
Returns a list of vehicle statuses.
